Plot: Poor Roger Ackroyd. He knew that the woman he loved had been harboring a guilty secret - she poisoned her first husband. And yesterday she killed herself. But guilty secrets rarely stay secret. Who had been blackmailing her before her death? Had it really driven her to suicide? And would it all be revealed in the letter that arrived in the evening post? Sadly Roger Ackroyd wasn't going to live long enough to find out...
Characters: Hercule Poirot, Dr James Sheppard, Caroline Sheppard, Roger Ackroyd, Flora Ackroyd, Mrs. Ackroyd, Hector Blunt, Ralph Paton, Geoffrey Raymond (The Murder of Roger Ackroyd), Parker (The Murder of Roger Ackroyd), Elizabeth Russell (The Murder of Roger Ackroyd), Mrs. Ferrars, Charles Kent, Inspector Raglan, Mr. Hammond
